statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{4 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 1 , -8 \, x^{3} + 8 \, x^{2} + 10 \, x - 2 , -12 \, x^{3} + 12 \, x^{2} + 15 \, x - 3 , -x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 5 , 19 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 8 \, x - 11\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
